Detailed Description

Packet that is sent as a reply to the Item Info Request packet.

Contains pairs with the type of information and the actual information, e.g. ("Address", "Baravägen 1"). Also contain the name etc. of the item. All strings will be written in the language that is specified in the request packet, if this language is available.

bool ItemInfoReplyPacket::getInfo (  vector< VanillaMatch * > &  matches  )  const
 

Get the information and put it into matches.

It is required that the number of matches is the same as the number of ItemInfoData.
